content.title: Organization’s Activities
content.body: WSO2 is one of the biggest open-source technology providers in the world today. Their main products are Identity Server, Choreo and Ballerina.

content.title: My Responsibilities
content.body: My primary tasks are to work on the managment and development of the Identity Server and Asgardeo's front-end features. For development, I mainly use React JS and Java

content.title: My Accomplishments
content.body: In just two weeks, I developed a complete website to demonstrate a newly developed feature, using a technology I had never used before. This is the applicaiton that is currently used by the company to demonstrate that new feature.

content.title: Challenges Faced
content.body: Being new to the field of Identity and Access Management, it was challenging to learn a lot of new concepts quickly.

experiences.place: Department of Computer Science & Engineering, University of Moratuwa

content.title: Organization’s Activities
content.body: I served as a teaching assistant for the CS 3042 Database Systems module, which explains the fundamentals of database operations.

content.title: My Responsibilities
content.body: My main responsibilities were to help the students during the practical sessions and mark their assignments.

content.title: My Accomplishments
content.body: In a hands-on lesson, I assisted a struggling student in comprehending how JOIN queries operate. It was one of my accomplishments during this brief period.

content.title: Challenges Faced
content.body: Learning how to help students was a little challenging at first, but as time passed, it became natural and enjoyable.

content.title: Organization’s Activities
content.body: Fcode Labs is one of the new up-and-coming software engineering companies, where its operations are based in Sri Lanka and Singapore.

content.title: My Responsibilities
content.body: I was hired as a mobile developer and UI/UX designer. My responsibilities were to design and develop mobile applications developed by the company.

content.title: My Accomplishments
content.body: During my brief tenure at the company, I focused primarily on their newest product, Workmate. This app's completion is my main accomplishment.

content.title: Challenges Faced
content.body: The main challenge I faced was adapting to the work-from-home environment, due to the covid pandemic situation.

content.title: Organization’s Activities
content.body: Sieve is a Singapore-based company where they empower consumers to make informed decisions on their digital privacy.

content.title: My Responsibilities
content.body: My main duties included designing their data privacy chatbot mobile application and redesigning the company's main webpage.

content.title: My Accomplishments
content.body: My achievements included learning and mastering Adobe XD and becoming aware of the importance of data privacy in today's technological world.

content.title: Challenges Faced
content.body: The main challenge I faced was learning how to work and communicate with people of diverse nationalities and different backgrounds.
